sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, shipping address, and payment information.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to process your orders, communicate with you, improve our services, and comply with legal obligations.

sections.heading: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our business, subject to confidentiality agreements.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to or restrict certain processing of your data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

sections.heading: 我们收集的信息
sections.content: 我们收集您直接向我们提供的信息，例如当您创建账户、进行购买或联系我们寻求支持时。这可能包括您的姓名、电子邮件地址、送货地址和付款信息。

sections.heading: 我们如何使用您的信息
sections.content: 我们使用收集的信息来处理您的订单、与您沟通、改进我们的服务并遵守法律义务。

sections.heading: 信息共享
sections.content: 我们不会向第三方出售或出租您的个人信息。我们可能会与协助我们运营业务的服务提供商共享您的信息，但须遵守保密协议。

sections.heading: 数据安全
sections.content: 我们实施适当的技术和组织措施，以保护您的个人信息免遭未经授权的访问、更改、披露或破坏。

sections.heading: 您的权利
sections.content: 您有权访问、更正或删除您的个人信息。您还可以反对或限制对您数据的某些处理。请联系我们以行使这些权利。

sections.heading: Cookie
sections.content: 我们使用Cookie和类似技术来增强您的体验、分析使用情况并协助我们的营销工作。您可以通过浏览器设置控制Cookie。
